reviewText: I bought the Ken Whiting "Playboater's Handbook II" book together with his "Playboating with Ken Whiting" video. Individually, each contains excellent explanations and visual illustrations.  Together they constitute the clearest and most comprehensive whitewater kayak control training material I have found.
Ken really spends time breaking down each move etc. It's the type of DVD you can watch over and over again.
Loved watching it. Wish I had a TV next to the pool I tried practicing in.
